definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Listen to the reports, know the landscape, plug your ears, and go on ahead.
sentences.chinese: 聽聽報道，瞭解地形，塞住耳朵，然後勇往直前。

sentences.english: Zhijin unique karst topography, Zhijin reputation at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 織金縣擁有獨特的喀斯特地形，織金洞享譽國內外。

sentences.english: The entire lower level is set into the ground and acoustically isolated.
sentences.chinese: 整個住宅底層沿着地面地形設置，隔音空間單獨設置。

sentences.english: The construction of road model and the terrain-matching method.
sentences.chinese: 道路模型結構及地形匹配算法。

sentences.english: With the aid of the most sophisticated surveying cameras, their topographies are also mapped.
sentences.chinese: 利用最先進的測量相機對繪製地形地圖。

sentences.english: The city is topographically higher than the surrounding land.
sentences.chinese: 就地形學而言，聖城要比四周的土地都要高。

sentences.english: There are also lots of algorithms to create artificial terrains .
sentences.chinese: 現在有很多算法來生成了人工的地形。

sentences.english: Topographically, Chongqing features hills and low mountains.
sentences.chinese: 在地形上，重慶以小山和低山爲主要特色。

sentences.english: This sort of impassible terrain has no grid overlaid on it.
sentences.chinese: 這類不覺疼痛的地形沒有在它上塗上的閘極欄。

sentences.english: Digital Terrain Modeling (DTM) is an important utility of GIS.
sentences.chinese: 數字地形模型是GIS的一個重要應用。

sentences.english: The dynamic terrain experiments demonstrate that DDTS is practicable and efficient.
sentences.chinese: 動態地形仿真實驗驗證了DDTS的有效性。

sentences.english: The bathymetric variation consists of a slowly varying component and a fast, small amplitude varying component.
sentences.chinese: 其中的地形變化包括慢變分量和小振幅快變分量。

sentences.english: An overhead view of the south stairs reveals the deference of the stairway to the topography.
sentences.chinese: 南部臺階的頂視圖揭示了這些踏步對於地形的尊重。

sentences.english: The NATO player is advised to utilize the terrain and engineer units to dig in.
sentences.chinese: 給北約玩家的勸告是使用地形與工兵單位去挖地洞。

sentences.english: The distribution was consistent with local yield and landform.
sentences.chinese: 分佈情況與實地的產量和地形地貌基本一致。

sentences.english: New terrains have been added, and terrain tile sets redone.
sentences.chinese: 新的地形已補充說，與地形瓦集重做。

definition: strategically situated and easy to defend/strategic location
topography of a mountain/features of a mountain
